examples.sentence: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern life.
The ubiquitous smell of stinky tofu follows you in Taipei's night markets.
QR codes are ubiquitous in China's payment systems.
Plastic pollution has reached ubiquitous levels in our oceans.

examples.sentence: The farmer gently cleaned the cow's udder before milking.
Modern dairy farms use laser scanners to monitor udder health.
Veterinarians check for mastitis by palpating the udder.
The sheep's udder was swollen, indicating possible infection.
The farmer reported seeing a UFO hovering over his cornfield at midnight.
Pentagon finally released classified UFO footage after decades of denial.
Kids built a UFO-shaped snowman after watching sci-fi movies.
The UFO-shaped restaurant in Taiwan has become a tourist hotspot.
The Nevada desert is famous for frequent UFO sightings.
Ugandans celebrate their independence day with traditional dances.
The Ugandan won gold in the 2023 African Games marathon.
Ugandan coffee beans are famous for their fruity flavor.
We watched a documentary about Ugandan mountain gorillas.
Ugh! Who ate my durian pizza?
Ugh! This traffic jam makes me miss my hotpot reservation!
Ugh...I shouldn't have challenged a Sichuan native to eat spicy crayfish.
Ugh! My tongue feels like it's on fire after that ghost pepper challenge!
Ugh! Stinky tofu smells like my gym socks after hiking Mount Tai!

The ugliness of the abandoned building scared away potential buyers.
No amount of makeup could hide the ugliness of his actions.
Her kindness contrasted sharply with his inner ugliness.

"The answer is, uh, 42?" said the uncertain contestant

This symphony incorporates Ukrainian folk melodies.

The panda's paw showed signs of ulceration from captivity.
Diabetes slows the healing of skin ulceration.
The ulceration process begins with tissue breakdown.

The treasure was hidden in ulterior regions of the cave.

Ancient Greek poetry often rhymed the ultima of each line.

examples.sentence: The ultimate of human exploration might be settling on Mars.

The fighter jet reached its ultimate speed.

This is your ultimate chance to fix the bug before launch.

In the ultimate, all disputes stem from miscommunication.

This borscht uses authentic Ukrainian recipe.
My Ukrainian colleague taught me to make pysanka eggs.
The Ukrainian diaspora keeps vyshyvanka traditions alive.

Skipping breakfast ultimately leads to buying overpriced bubble tea.

examples.sentence: Ultraviolet radiation turns white clothes into neon colors under blacklight.
The museum uses ultraviolet detectors to protect ancient paintings.
Banknotes have hidden patterns visible under ultraviolet light.

Her umber eyes reminded me of roasted chestnuts.

examples.sentence: I'm unaccustomed to eating stinky tofu at breakfast.

An unaccustomed silence fell over the kindergarten classroom.
Northerners are unaccustomed to the humidity of southern summers.

examples.sentence: Building a Dyson sphere is currently unachievable for humanity.
Getting 100% likes on Weibo is virtually unachievable.
Time travel may remain unachievable for centuries.
The inventor died with his genius unacknowledged by the academic community.
Many wartime heroes remain unacknowledged in official histories.
This unacknowledged masterpiece was recently rediscovered in a garage sale.
Chili oil is the unacknowledged eighth wonder of Chinese cuisine.
My WeChat message about salary raise stayed unacknowledged for 3 months.
The customer complaint email was deliberately left unacknowledged.
Many migrant workers' contributions go unacknowledged in city development.

examples.sentence: I'm unacquainted with the latest TikTok dance challenges.
The AI assistant pretended to be unacquainted with human emotions.
At the alumni party, many faces remained unacquainted.
Delivery robots treat all humans as unacquainted strangers.
The unacquainted streets of Chengdu smelled of peppercorn oil.
Her WeChat profile photo showed an unacquainted glamorous style.
Gen Zers are unacquainted with the concept of phone booths.
The unaddressed love letter was found blowing in the wind.
Unaddressed complaints often end up in the trash bin.
The museum displayed unaddressed wartime postcards.
Her collection included mysterious unaddressed envelopes.
The unadjusted GDP data caused heated debate among economists.
Her unadjusted glasses made the world look like a Picasso painting.

The monk's unadorned speech moved millions on Douyin.
Xi'an's unadorned dumplings focus purely on flavor.
The documentary shows the unadorned truth about panda's laziness.
The unadulterated honey from Xinjiang crystallizes naturally.
This milk claims to be unadulterated with water.
His Sichuan accent is unadulterated Chengdu dialect.
We serve unadulterated Cantonese dim sum here.
The album showcases her unadulterated musical talent.
Children's laughter is unadulterated joy.
That was unadulterated nonsense during the meeting.
The project ended in unadulterated failure.
The documentary shows the unadulterated truth of rural education.
I prefer the unadulterated version of this folk song.
The unadventurous hiking route is full of handrails and warning signs.
Theme parks design unadventurous rides for toddlers.
His unadventurous diet consists only of fried rice and eggs.
The unadventurous traveler booked all-inclusive resort packages.

examples.sentence: The latest iPhone becomes unaffordable after three consecutive pay cuts.
Luxury skincare is unaffordable for most college students.
Private healthcare remains unaffordable for migrant workers.
Renting near subway stations is unaffordable for new graduates.
Pork suddenly became unaffordable during the price surge.
Weekend travel is an unaffordable luxury for ICU doctors.

examples.sentence: The little dinosaur looked unaided in the Jurassic jungle.
Her unaided eyes couldn't see the WeChat notification from 5 meters away.
He completed the Hotpot Challenge unaided, with tears streaming down his face.
The unaided startup grew into a tech giant like Alibaba.

examples.sentence: Her unaffected manner made her stand out among influencers.
The celebrity's unaffected reply won public approval.
Pandas remain unaffected by the chaos around their enclosures.
The old teahouse stays unaffected by modern trends.
True love remains unaffected by distance.
The monk's unalloyed devotion moved all pilgrims.
This Himalayan salt claims to be unalloyed by modern pollutants.
Her smile showed unalloyed joy when seeing pandas.
The child's unalloyed curiosity reminded me of baby otters.
Meteorite jewelry uses unalloyed iron from outer space.
Ancient coins were often made of unalloyed metals.
Eating hotpot gives me unalloyed happiness in winter.
The documentary showed the unalloyed truth about plastic pollution.
The laws of physics are unalterable truths in our universe.
Her decision to quit was as unalterable as the Great Wall.
The ancient temple has stood with unalterable majesty for centuries.
His love for spicy hotpot remained unalterable despite stomach issues.
The North Star's position is nearly unalterable in human time scale.
She held unalterable faith in traditional Chinese medicine.
That pandas love bamboo is an unalterable fact of nature.
The constitution contains some unalterable laws about national sovereignty.
The recipe remains unaltered since the Qing Dynasty.
Her childhood diary was found unaltered in the attic.
The mountain scenery stays unaltered through centuries.
His love for spicy hotpot is unaltered by age.
The morning routine continued unaltered during the holiday.
Grandpa's clock ticks unaltered for 50 years.
The campus looks unaltered since our graduation.
His bad temper remains unaltered after marriage.
The teacher gave unambiguous instructions: 'Submit before 11:59PM or it's chicken feed!'
Xi Jinping's speech delivered an unambiguous message about Taiwan.
The pregnancy test showed unambiguous double lines.
TikTok's algorithm makes unambiguous recommendations based on your 3AM browsing history.
The 4K surveillance video provided unambiguous evidence of the panda stealing bamboo.
The traffic sign unambiguously prohibits U-turns with a giant red X.
She unambiguously declared her love by writing 'Marry me?' on the Great Wall.
The contract states unambiguously that overtime pay equals 3x hotpot meals.
His WeChat status unambiguously reads: 'Single as a pringle'.

examples.sentence: The unambitious scholar prefers reading in his rural cottage.
Her unambitious attitude towards fame surprised the entertainment industry.
Pandas are wonderfully unambitious creatures, content with bamboo and naps.
Unlike his Wall Street peers, he's perfectly unambitious about promotions.
Her unambitious description of her Nobel Prize impressed everyone.
The CEO's unambitious office reflects his humble personality.
Retired in a tea plantation, he's blissfully unambitious nowadays.
The panda looked unamused when tourists imitated its chewing.
Her unamused expression said everything about the dad joke.

examples.sentence: The decision was made with surprising unanimity among the committee.
Unanimity in the jury room is as rare as a panda sneeze.
The UN Security Council rarely achieves unanimity on major issues.
Our family reached unanimity on ordering spicy hotpot for dinner.
After 8 hours of debate, the team finally reached unanimity on the logo design.
The judges were unanimous in choosing the spicy hotpot as the best dish.
After 3 hours of debate, the committee reached a unanimous decision to extend nap time.
The Weibo poll showed unanimous support for adding a 'dislike' button.
There was unanimous agreement that pineapple belongs on pizza.
The new emoji was approved by unanimous consent of the Unicode committee.
The jury unanimously acquitted the panda who stole bamboo.
TikTokers voted unanimously to extend lunch break by 2 hours.
The cats raised their paws unanimously for more fish subsidies.
The resolution was passed unanimously with 0 objections.
The hotpot flavor was voted unanimously as the office favorite.
The celebrity couple's unannounced visit caused chaos in the mall.
My mom's unannounced video call caught me eating instant noodles at 2am.

examples.sentence: The toddler's question 'Why is the sky blue?' was unanswerable to the sleep-deprived father.
ChatGPT met with an unanswerable query: 'Do you like durian pizza?'
Delivery drivers are unanswerable for traffic jams during lunch rush.
The AI claimed it was unanswerable for generating meme lyrics.
My WeChat message to the boss remains unanswered for 3 days.
The customer complaint email was left unanswered during the holiday.
Her unanswered knock on the door suggested nobody was home.
The unanswered fire alarm caused serious consequences.
Never leave your girlfriend's texts unanswered for more than 2 hours.
The unanticipated rain turned our picnic into a steamed bun feast in the car.
His unanticipated resignation left the company scrambling like headless chickens.
The celebrity remained unapologetic after stepping on a fan's toes during a concert.
His unapologetic attitude made the argument worse than it needed to be.
The unapologetic cat knocked over the vase and stared at its owner defiantly.
She gave an unapologetic shrug when asked about the missing cookies.
His unapologetic silence spoke volumes during the meeting.
The artist was unapologetic about her controversial new style.
Her unapologetically honest feedback helped improve the project.
He showed unapologetic pride in his homemade chili oil.
The durian-flavored latte was so unappealing that even food bloggers refused to try it.
His dating profile photo with sunglasses at night made him extremely unappealing.
That pixelated logo is visually unappealing like a 1990s website.

examples.sentence: The unappreciited intern wrote 'I debug code for free' on his coffee mug.
Classical musicians often feel unappreciited in the TikTok era.
The unappreciited crosstalk performance deserved more laughters.

examples.sentence: The unappreciative boss threw my 100-page report directly into the shredder.
Her unappreciative attitude towards street art shocked the graffiti community.
The panda kept eating bamboo with an unappreciative expression during the keeper's passionate speech.
My unappreciative cat walked over the limited-edition sneakers I just bought.
Gen Z is often accused of being unappreciative of vintage vinyl records.
